actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to make available to Congress the information obtained by the Special Prosecutor.

summary.text: Directs the Office of the Watergate Special Prosecution Force to transmit to the Speaker of the House of Representatives and to the President pro tempore of the Senate, to be available for inspection by all Members of Congress, all materials, documents, and reports obtained, prepared, and compiled by that Office, following a determination by the Attorney General that the rights of parties named therein or parties to related litigation will not be compromised.

titles.title: A bill to make available to Congress the information obtained by the Special Prosecutor.
